mapper.select:
select id as id, serialNo as serialNo, orderNo as orderNo, userId as userId, modelId as modelId, evaluateId as evaluateId, subscription as subscription, price as price, status as status, isComment as isComment, cancelReason as cancelReason, createdUserId as createdUserId, updatedUserId as updatedUserId, creatdTime as creatdTime, updatedTime as updatedTime, isDelete as isDelete from maintain_order
and id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into maintain_order( serialNo, orderNo, userId, modelId, evaluateId, subscription, price, status, isComment, cancelReason, createdUserId, updatedUserId, creatdTime, updatedTime, isDelete) values( #{serialNo}, #{orderNo}, #{userId}, #{modelId}, #{evaluateId}, #{subscription}, #{price}, #{status}, #{isComment}, #{cancelReason}, #{createdUserId}, #{updatedUserId}, #{creatdTime}, #{updatedTime}, #{isDelete})
mapper.update:
update maintain_order
serialNo=#{serialNo},
orderNo=#{orderNo},
userId=#{userId},
modelId=#{modelId},
evaluateId=#{evaluateId},
subscription=#{subscription},
price=#{price},
status=#{status},
isComment=#{isComment},
cancelReason=#{cancelReason},
createdUserId=#{createdUserId},
updatedUserId=#{updatedUserId},
creatdTime=#{creatdTime},
updatedTime=#{updatedTime},
isDelete=#{isDelete}
